doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 23 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 140[Air Date: 3/5/1985]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 23 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 140[Air Date: 3/5/1985]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Update on Human Rights Commission documenting anti-gay discrimination2. Interview with Keith O'Connor, Director of Discrimination for the NYC Human Rights CommissionCOMMERCIAL: "Lust in the Dust"3. Supreme court refuses to hear Ohio high school guidance counselor's gay discrimination case4. National Gay Task Force Versus Oklahoma City schools5. Baltimore city council members vote against gay civil rights (anti-discriminatory) law6. Carol Bellamy, President of the New York City council, runs for mayor, includes clip of Bellamy at Greater Gotham Business CouncilCOMMERCIAL: "The Connection," gay and lesbian newspaper7. The Foundation For Traditional Morality blames rise in AIDS to overturned Dallas sodomy law8. Local Dallas insurance agent misrepresents cancer plan to bar owners, says it includes AIDS, AIDS insurance plansCOMMERCIAL: National Fund for Human Dignity with Abigail "Dear Abby" Van Buren9. Washing D.C. gay activists ask city to help fund AIDS education, counseling, and services10. Reagan administration lacks AIDS funding support11. Inter-faith Forum clip on Religion and AIDSCOMMERCIAL: Disc-o-rama, NY video and music store12. Sports13. Healthline: Conversations with GMHC: Christopher Collins, Cooperating Attorney with LAMBDA Legal Defense and Education Fund, discusses HTLVIII test14. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. Media reports/current events/culture including Reagan rap and "Pleasure Beach" clip[COMMERCIAL: "Lust in the Dust"]2. Barbara Esposito and Bruce Hopkins start gay comedy night at Paper Moon, clips and outtakesCOMMERCIAL: "Manscape," a gay magazine3. Interview with psychologist, Dr. Jim Serafini, discusses AIDS and sex fears
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 23 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 140[Air Date: 3/5/1985]: March 1985
